purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of interconnected AI assistants to build complex multi-agent systems.
principle: Builds on OpenAI's API to orchestrate multiple AI assistants, allowing them to function as tools within a larger system.
reusability: Designed to be modular, allowing for easy integration and linkage of various AI assistants via APIs.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability; dependent on OpenAI's API.
name: experts
description: Experts.js is the easiest way to create and deploy OpenAI's Assistants and link them together as Tools to create advanced Multi AI Agent Systems with expanded memory and attention to detail.
highlight: Integrates OpenAI's Assistants into advanced multi-agent systems with expanded memory and attention to detail.
